DataElement.preferredName: Patient Single Systemic Corticosteroid As Prior Medication Usage Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator related to the eligibility of a person who receives medical attention is given hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland only as medication taken previously.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Single Systemic Corticosteroid As Prior Medication Usage Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention is given hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland only as medication taken previously.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Single Systemic Corticosteroid As Prior Medication Usage Administered
Property.preferredDefinition:
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else. :(sis-TEM-ik) Affecting the entire body.:Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).(NCI):In the same amount or manner; to the same degree; in the role, function, or capacity of.
:An indication or description that medications were taken previously.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).
In the same amount or manner; to the same degree; in the role, function, or capacity of.
An indication or description that medications were taken previously.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient require phar
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient require pharmacologic doses of systemic corticosteroids except as premedication for blood product administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require or will likely require pharmacologic doses of systemic corticosteroids except as premedication for blood product administration (<=2 mg/kg of hydrocortisone or an equivalent dose of an alternative corticosteroid)?
